archimate:BusinessEvent.name: CAPEC-240: Resource Injection
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation: An adversary exploits weaknesses in input validation by manipulating resource identifiers enabling the unintended modification or specification of a resource.

properties.value: ::The target application allows the user to both specify the identifier used to access a system resource. Through this permission, the user gains the capability to perform actions on that resource (e.g., overwrite the file)::
::Ensure all input content that is delivered to client is sanitized against an acceptable content specification.::Perform input validation for all content.::Enforce regular patching of software.::
